entity_name.description: Person Name or Company name requesting the port

auth_person_name.description: Name of person authorizing the porting order

billing_phone_number.description: Billing phone number associated with these phone numbers

account_number.description: The authorized person's account number with the current service provider

tax_identifier.description: European tax identification number. Applicable only in the European Union

pin_passcode.description: PIN/passcode possibly required by the old service provider for extra verification

business_identifier.description: European business identification number. Applicable only in the European Union
